Text: Thank you for the many weeks of Super Rugby. I notice that there have been a great deal of downloaders but not many have said a "Thank You" which is a shame.
Agree with thepotman. Much appreciated. Even though I read the scores, I still watch the games...thank you for the effort. I hope you'll be sharing RWC 2011 with us. Regards from South Korea.
Yes, thank you for these matches bay!  I am enjoying them heaps!
Thanks a ton.  This is the only way I can watch good rugby from Waco, Texas.
